features: 【Valentines Gift For Kids】Autism toys for kids 8-12 are good for stimulating sensory development and helping kids concentrate. Sensory toys for autistic children 5-7 are the best gift choice for kids and those with autism! It's a creative gift idea for Halloween,Thanksgiving, Christmas,Birthday! If you are not satisfied with our sensory toys for kids 8-12, please communicate with us in time, we will be happy to serve you and make you satisfied!

【Toddler Travel Toys】The quiet fidget toy is great calming down corner supplies as a toddler toys for travel. Travel toddler toys are quiet enough not to disturb other people while playing, and travel toys for kids also keep you away from the noise annoyance caused by toys! Not only that, toddler fidget toys are very small and portable, you can put them in any small space ,Preschoolers play with classroom fidget toys in a calm corner classroom,which effectively relieves anxiety for kids.

【Educational Decompression Toys】Fidget toys for kids 5-7 can develop children's imagination and kids anxiety relief by combining them into different shapes. Kids sensory toys can also improve children's color perception and concentration by identifying different colors. It is also an educational toy for fine motor skills, sensory development, color sorting, shape sorting, counting and sorting, problem solving, spatial reasoning, and imaginative play!

【Child's Good Partner】The sensory toys for kids 5-7 are connected to each other and can only be rotated but not disassembled, so you don't need to worry about your children eating them by mistake! We use high-quality ABS material processing, non-toxic hypoallergenic! Fine workmanship makes the surface of the puzzle ball smooth and burr-free, which will not hurt children's hands! It's also very easy to clean, and the smooth surface is not easy to accumulate dirta!

【Sensory Fidget Toy】Yrissmiss educational ball is a fun sensory toy. The sensory toys for toddlers 3+ are seamlessly combined with 20 small balls of the same size, and each small ball is connected to two balls respectively. Such a special structure makes it possible to combine 20 small balls into different shapes through rotation. 10 different colored balls are easy to attract children's attention!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small, quiet and entertaining toy!
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for on the go play! I wanted something small that my kids could play with, but would fit in a coat pocket without multiple pieces for on the go play - in the car, doctors office, church, etc. and these are perfect! It's small enough to fit in their coat pockets, but moves into many different shapes so they are entertained for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved by all ages
reviews.reviewText: Brought these originally fir my daughter who's an occupational therapist. However we loved playing with them I bought more to gift for age 6 to 60! Great fidgeting toy and to help with fine motor skills. I have arthritis in my hands so find it a way to keep my hands loose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun fidget, less quality than expected
reviews.reviewText: They look a lot nicer in the pictures. They’re thin plastic. Still fun, just gotta be gentler than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for many ages
reviews.reviewText: This toy has been really fun for babies, toddlers and adults alike! It's twisty and easy to hold. It's been a fun toy for our family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cool little fidget toy
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these products for my toddlers, four and three years old, to have as a handheld fidget toy for when we leave the house (i.e. grocery shopping, or running errands). The idea was to keep them occupied while I shopped or made my runs but it didn’t work. My son, the three year old, is on the spectrum but this toy didn’t do it for him. It could be that he’s still too young or he could just have zero interest. My daughter enjoys it more with making different shapes and figures. Either way, this only captures both of their attention for a brief (really brief) moment. It’s super durable though and it maneuvers well, just not enough excitement for my little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: But it really helps alot with autistic child a very good distraction when they're having a breakdown love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My sensory seeking 4 year old wanted to love this soo bad. But unfortunately it was very difficult for him to be able to work, which was disappointing due to the age being 3+. My niece whos 12 couldnt figure it out. It also has a high pitched squeak, and he freaks out. He only played with it 3 or 4 times. And hasn't touched it since. Very sad purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these for stocking stuffers!
